text:
<!everyone> hey everyone!
i know this is a sort of crazy week. i hope everyone is able to take a little downtime around the holidays and recharge before 2022. i have a few quick announcements, but first just want to thank each and every one of you for being part of this community. collectively, the members of superpath make it a fun, supportive and helpful environment. i'm consistently humbled and impressed by the high-quality discourse i see happening every day. you all are awesome and i wish you the very best in 2022!
---
okay a few quick things:
• Here's the recording of our Zoom hangout with <@U02546A8D2B> → <https://superpath.co/blog/ross-simmonds-content-distribution>. we had 45 people show up, a signal that we should be doing more of these. i'm already planning the next one. (major thanks to ross for doing this, he's awesome!)
• I'm working on our salary report and someone reported earning *$1.4m this year*. Is there an extra "0" or this is an awesome story that we need to know more about it!?? If this was you, please DM me! (we can keep this anonymous.) :money_mouth_face:
• We have a cool new _*5 Minutes on Content*_ presentation this week. Here's <@U02CZJT4FDG> on how to do better customer research → <https://superpath.co/blog/ryan-paul-gibson-on-customer-research>
• This is the last week to get a deal on our _*How to Manage a Content Team*_ course → <https://pro.superpath.co/how-to-manage-a-content-team?coupon=BLACKFRIDAYCOURSE>
• we've had some great threads this week, including this one <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1639588980094300|on new content formats to try next year> (:wave: <@UMQASRN1W>) and these suggestions <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1639496553048800|on how to get thought leadership content written>. i also wanted to shout <@U024K88ECFN> for all the helpful responses in <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CJ7QQKJ73/p1639522578065700|this thread>. shoot me a DM with your email address and i'll send over a free audiobook credit :grinning::books:
• and lastly, i created a new channel called <#C02RGHQ4HK7|hire-me>. please use this channel if you're looking for freelance or full-time work rather than <#C021RFDHEMD|all-things-freelance>. and just in case folks aren't aware of all of our channels, here's a complete list: <#C0242UCLXUY|b2c-content-chat> <#CUYDAGXKR|-b2b-content-chat> <#CJ7QJ4WKB|-career-advice> <#CJ7QQKJ73|-content-strategy-questions> <#CJE3XC44V|-job-listings> <#C022W2V1Q0Y|-seo-talk> <#C0226F0HVV1|agency-life> <#C021RFDHEMD|all-things-freelance> <#C025TCPL59D|colorado> <#CN9UCQ92A|content-seo-tools> <#C018DRKH0M9|diversity-and-inclusion> <#C016ENU9KNU|essential-reading> <#CKRJX5U5A|guest-posts> <#C02RGHQ4HK7|hire-me> <#C01PKP5C8R1|pets> (the best one) <#C012AUSC85C|promotion> <#CTF6SG2GP|team-mgmt> <#CJE58H0P2|watercooler> <#CK1HFB8SD|writing-feedback> 
i'll post our usual jobs roundup on friday, then i'm out next week. have a great week, happy holidays and happy new year everyone!
:v: jimmy
